text:
I tried to compile standard packages I want to use (8 packages) with PackageCompiler
and I get this

```$ julia --sysimage ./sys_flux_julia.so
/home/mateusz/.local/share/jupyter/kernels/julia-1.5/sys_flux_julia.so: undefined symbol: jfptr_llvmname_79554```
Any ideas?

text: Is VectorizationBase in your manifest? I ran into this issue and found that using an older version worked (issue is here: <https://github.com/JuliaLang/PackageCompiler.jl/issues/487|https://github.com/JuliaLang/PackageCompiler.jl/issues/487>)
